snippet: Vito J. Lopez resigned from the Assembly last month under pressure after a scathing report from a legislative ethics panel.
abstract: Legislative ethics panel will impose the largest fine in its history on former Assemblyman Vito J Lopez for reportedly sexually harassing several of his former employees; penalty, said to be $330,000, is unlikely to personally cost Lopez, since he can pay it using his campaign funds.

byline.original: By DANNY HAKIM and THOMAS KAPLAN

lead_paragraph: Vito J. Lopez resigned from the Assembly last month under pressure after a scathing report from a legislative ethics panel.

headline.seo: Vito Lopez Said to Face $330,000 Fine for Sexual Abuse
headline.main: Lopez Is Said to Be Fined Over Sexual Abuse
headline.print_headline: Lopez Is Said to Be Fined Over Sexual Abuse
